          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Non-renewable resources</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nicht erneuerbare Betriebsmittel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressources non-renouvelables</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recursos non-renewable</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorse non rinnovabili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μη ανανεώσιμα στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recursos no renovables</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This bar chart compares the time it takes to deplete non-renewable resources if these are continuously used at the present rate.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">natural gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">non-renewable energy sources</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">primary energy sources</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Time</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Balkendiagramm vergleicht die Zeit, die es
nimmt, um nicht erneuerbare Betriebsmittel zu verbrauchen, wenn diese 
ununterbrochen mit der anwesenden Kinetik verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme à barres compare le temps où il 
prend pour épuiser les ressources non-renouvelables si ceux-ci sont 
sans interruption utilisés à la cadence actuelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta carta de barra compara o tempo onde faz 
exame para esgotar recursos non-renewable se estes forem usados 
continuamente na taxa atual.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma a colonna confronta il tempo che
prende per esaurire le risorse non rinnovabili se questi sono usati 
continuamente al tasso attuale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το ιστόγραμμα συγκρίνει το χρόνο που παίρνει για
να μειώσει τα μη ανανεώσιμα στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς εάν αυτοί 
χρησιμοποιούνται συνεχώς στο παρόν ποσοστό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta carta de barra compara el tiempo que toma 
para agotar recursos no renovables si éstos se utilizan continuamente
en la actual tarifa.</string>
          </description>
